name: Run 4 the Jewels
description:
Welcome Everybody to the Beta Version of the Game!

You are found in the city of Randomville, legend has it that there the buildings change in an unusual rate. Your mission is to collect the five sacred rounded jewels, but the enemies are now chasing you. Will you be able to collect them and return them to the sacred middle temple?

Beware! The walls of the city, though they seem easily passable for the enemy, you CANNOT! Good luck and happy ride.

Collect the 5 jewels and go back to the middle. Easy, right?
